text: Wrecking Ball is the 17th studio album by Bruce Springsteen and was released on 6 March, 2012 through Columbia Records. It went to number 1 in 16 countries including the United States and the United Kingdom and was nominated for 3 Grammy Awards in 2013. ==Track listing== Wrecking Ball was released as a two- LP set, a single CD, and a digital download. The CD and download versions were also available in a "Special Edition" format, which included two bonus tracks along with exclusive photos and artwork. The vinyl version included a copy of the standard CD (without the two additional tracks). == References == Category:2012 albums Category:Bruce Springsteen albums Category:Columbia Records albums
title: Wrecking Ball (Bruce Springsteen album)
